BPM TRACKER

Realtime BPM detection and visualization via the Web Audio API.

Works best for 4/4 music with a strong kick drum. The observed BPM range is 85 - 170 BPM. BPMs out of this range will be detected at half time or double time. BPM is detected by observing the 100 - 250 Mhz frequency range, where the kick drum is prevalent.

Note: audio playing in other Chrome tabs will not be picked up by Web Audio API.

Source Code available on Github

Built by Airtight Interactive / @felixturner
